SERVICE.name: Tender
SERVICE.COMMENT: This service implements the Tender Use Case of the Tender Package.

MAP.REGION:
This road is traversed when the operator has entered valid customer info, or no customer info is required.
Leaves the service
This road is used when configuration allows gift card number to be entered in the POS UI for tender.
This road is used when configuration requires the gift card number to be entered in 3rd party payment application.
This road is taken when operator chooses to cancel the gift card entry.
This road is taken when the operator chooses to undo the gift card entry.
Changes end for rev 1.11
